name: RAID 2020ᵀᴹ LOGO
description:
NFT pre-histor log...

[03-01-2020]
Around 2020 new year I remembered that as a 9 year old playing this Nintendo game, I was trying to grasp the concept of how could I possibly imagine how things were going to be when we would live in this year when I would be 40 years old. My young self told himself to hold on to this thought until I would be in this moment in order to retrospectively be able to compare what I was imagining then and how it is truly. So as a memento to 9 year old me, I made this loop in After Effects

05/01/2020
A 4K 16:9 version of this animation was released on VJLoops.com
https://www.vjloops.com/stock-video/raid2020-background-loop-01-155662.html

07/01/2020
A 4K 16:9 fullscreen version of the background filling the logo was released on VJLoops.com
https://www.vjloops.com/stock-video/soft-landscape-09-155795.html

15/01/2020
AVGN released a video episode on this game. This made me so happy, could not believe that James, a content creator I have been following for the last 15 years even before youtube made such a great video on it so this NFT is dedicated to JAMES ROLFE. 

https://youtu.be/fuOmmIOdPg8

13/08/2021
minting this 1:1 | 1080x1080 | 90 FRAMES | 24FPS
In retrospect I don't think it as as bad as predicted by the game, surely much worse than I would have thought then... In any case :  fuck the year 2020 :)
